channel.title: RSCScar Back up on old DB!
channel.description:
[size=26pt]Welcome to RSCSca, RuneScape classic private serverr[/size] Since the mod only made a post and a ban I making a new topic and someone can delete or lock the other one.
Im hosting RSCScar again because there not to many server out there and for fun. Server is backup on old DB so login into your old account and have fun:)
http://rscscar.doesntexist.org http://www.mediafire.com/?4aqrck9w53sq4k4
[u][b][size=10pt]We offer our members:[/size][/b][/u] * RSCDaemon/EasyRSC/Stork based server. * Clan system + ClanTags. * PK styled. * Good looking client. * Large client. * Good game play. * Many updates. * Mature Mods/Administrators. [u] [b][size=10pt]Server details:[/size][/b][/u] * Clan system + Clan Tags infront of your name + ClanChat. * Delay for npc attacking. * Theiving . * Good money start (Mans hut). * 1k start money + Food Chef. * The monsters are duplicated 2x. * F2P with 99 max stat. (Will upgrade to P2P or stay F2P with 110 max stat. * XP rate = 50x / Donators = 50x x 1.5. * XP in wilderness = 65x. * Big + Small client. * 10 minutes AFK delay
[b][size=8pt]Regular Commands:[/size][/b] ::say ::online / ::onlinelist ::skull ::stuck (30 seconds delay)
[b][size=8pt]ClanCommands:[/size][/b] ::createclan <name> ::Invite <name> ::Clanaccept ::C <your clanmesssage> ::Leaveclan ::Clankick <name> [b] [size=8pt]ClanLeader commands:[/size][/b] ::Clankick <name> ::Claninvite <name> ::C <your Message> ::Clanmod <name> (Coming soon).
[b][size=10pt]Information:[/size][/b] Download the client and login (Registers your character when you first time login.) OBS: You can only create one character every 10 minutes. You can only be in 1 clan at same time, and you can only create 1 clan each 2 hours.. ClanModerate a member in your private clan is about to come soon. If Clan leader kick you out from clan or if you leave a clan then logout after, to get full effect.
[b]
[b] Pictures:[/b]
[img]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/4349/ss20100409212810.png[/img]
[img]http://img262.imageshack.us/img262/1685/ss20100408192833a.png[/img]
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/3/ss20100408191829.png[/img]
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/9047/ss20100408191912.png[/img]
[img]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/715/ss20100408192324.png[/img]
[img]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/654/ss20100408192624.png[/img]
http://www.mediafire.com/?4aqrck9w53sq4k4 http://rscscar.doesntexist.org
Any flame will be reported, this is a advertisement only no need to discuss ME/YOU or anyone that isn't related to the server.

item.title: RSCScar Back up on old DB!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Server is gone. Locking topic so that members can find active servers easier.

If this server comes back, message me and I will unlock.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCScar Back up on old DB!
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[size=26pt]Welcome to RSCSca, RuneScape classic private serverr[/size]
Since the mod only made a post and a ban I making a new topic and someone can delete or lock the other one.

Im hosting RSCScar again because there not to many server out there and for fun.
Server is backup on old DB so login into your old account and have fun:)

http://rscscar.doesntexist.org
http://www.mediafire.com/?4aqrck9w53sq4k4

[size=10pt]We offer our members:[/size]
* RSCDaemon/EasyRSC/Stork based server.
* Clan system + ClanTags.
* PK styled.
* Good looking client.
* Large client.
* Good game play.
* Many updates.
* Mature Mods/Administrators.

[size=10pt]Server details:[/size]
* Clan system + Clan Tags infront of your name + ClanChat.
* Delay for npc attacking.
* Theiving .
* Good money start (Mans hut).
* 1k start money + Food Chef.
* The monsters are duplicated 2x.
* F2P with 99 max stat. (Will upgrade to P2P or stay F2P with 110 max stat.
* XP rate = 50x / Donators = 50x x 1.5.
* XP in wilderness = 65x.

  • Big + Small client.
  • 10 minutes AFK delay

[size=8pt]Regular Commands:[/size]
::say
::online / ::onlinelist
::skull
::stuck (30 seconds delay)

[size=8pt]ClanCommands:[/size]
::createclan
::Invite
::Clanaccept
::C
::Leaveclan
::Clankick

[size=8pt]ClanLeader commands:[/size]
::Clankick
::Claninvite
::C
::Clanmod (Coming soon).

[size=10pt]Information:[/size]
Download the client and login (Registers your character when you first time login.)
OBS: You can only create one character every 10 minutes.
You can only be in 1 clan at same time, and you can only create 1 clan each 2 hours…
ClanModerate a member in your private clan is about to come soon.
If Clan leader kick you out from clan or if you leave a clan then logout after, to get full effect.

[b]


Pictures:

[img]http://img262.imageshack.us/img262/1685/ss20100408192833a.png[/img]

[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/3/ss20100408191829.png[/img]

[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/9047/ss20100408191912.png[/img]

[img]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/715/ss20100408192324.png[/img]

[img]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/654/ss20100408192624.png[/img]

http://www.mediafire.com/?4aqrck9w53sq4k4
http://rscscar.doesntexist.org

Any flame will be reported, this is a advertisement only no need to discuss ME/YOU or anyone that isn’t related to the server.

Read full topic
